Class Workspace

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.purl.sword.base.XmlElement

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SwordElementInterface

    public class Workspace
extends XmlElement
implements SwordElementInterface
    Represents an Atom Publishing Protocol Workspace element.
    Author:
    Neil Taylor
